debug.radar.help: F3 + F = Open Radar settings menu
radar.config.title: Radar Options
radar.config.enabled.tooltip: Allows the mod to upload spots to the map
radar.config.shareUser.tooltip: Shares your username on the web map
radar.config.playSound.tooltip: Allows the mod to play sounds when successfully adding a spot, or when a spot has already been added
radar.config.devMode.tooltip: Toggles the URL to localhost. Will require a rejoin if toggled on MCC Island to reauthenticate
